actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to Subcommittee on Government Information, Justice and Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Information, Justice, and Agriculture
Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security

official_title: A bill to amend section 552 of title 5, United States Code, to exempt from disclosure to the public matters relating to the design and construction of facilities of a diplomatic nature if such disclosure would present a physical security threat to that facility or would endanger the life or physical safety of any individual in those facilities.

summary.text: Amends the Freedom of Information Act to protect from disclosure records related to the design and construction of facilities of a diplomatic nature, if such disclosure represents a security threat.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 552 of title 5, United States Code, to exempt from disclosure to the public matters relating to the design and construction of facilities of a diplomatic nature if such disclosure would present a physical security threat to that facility or would endanger the life or physical safety of any individual in those facilities.
